title: @Riot, since you are all about clarity, can you please put clarity in your items??
body:
Hey Riot,

You keep saying that you put text in for clarity, but can you please clarify some of your item text? The best example for this is between Guinsoo's Rageblade and Blade of the Ruined King. 
BOTH state that basic attacks have an effect. However, if you have a Runaan's Hurricane {{item:3085}} , only the passive from the BotRK {{item:3153}} applies to the extra bolts and NOT the Guinsoo's Rageblade's {{item:3124}} "Guinsoo's Rage" passive. This is very confusing. 

There are other examples, like Spell Vamp not working with Teemo's Toxic shot, but works with Jax's Ult. 

Thanks,
Lycan
